weather.title: Weather — Arlington, VA
weather.summary: Today: Cloudy, high 41°F. Next 3 days show variable conditions with possible precipitation mid-week.

items.name: This Afternoon
items.details: Cloudy, with a high near 41. Northwest wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

items.name: Tonight
items.details: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 25. Northwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

items.name: Tuesday
items.details: Sunny, with a high near 39. West wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

items.name: Tuesday Night
items.forecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Light Snow
items.details: A chance of snow between 1am and 4am, then a chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 32. South wind 2 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

items.name: Wednesday
items.details: A chance of rain and snow before 1pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 54. Southwest wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

items.name: Wednesday Night
items.forecast: Partly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Rain
items.details: A slight chance of rain after 1am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 37. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

items.name: Thursday
items.details: Rain likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 48. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

items.name: Thursday Night
items.details: Rain likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 34. Chance of precipitation is 70%.
